This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0083 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
D Outlier daysOutlier days
C Outlier costOutlier cost

name: OutlierType
title: outlierType
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts specifying the type of outlier (i.e. period of care beyond DRG-standard stay in facility) that has been paid.   Used in HL7 Vesrion 2.x messaghing in the DRG segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0083 (Outlier Type)

property.description: Version of HL7 in which the code was deprecated
